channel.title: Making a command to refresh the screen

item.title: Making a command to refresh the screen
item.dc:creator: @liltwixis11 liltwixis11
item.description:
@liltwixis11 wrote:

i tried to make a command that refreshes the screen, like its annoying when u kill sum1 and u dont see them spawning at bank, they just stay there, but if u click like train emote, it refreshes, so this is the command i tried, i dont get errors but it doesnt refresh screen

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("refresh") && playerRights >= 0) { updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
any ideas?[br][size=1]Posted on: March 31, 2007, 11:18:03 AM[/size][hr]ne1?[br][size=1]Posted on: March 31, 2007, 11:42:55 AM[/size][hr]â€¦
